attributes.action: Abolish the Pay as You Throw Scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How is it fare to tax people on their production of household waste? People Should be allowed to throw away rubbish as they already pay a council tax. There should be another way to encourage people to recycle, not just impose a fine!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
